participant_1.background:
I value my health and well-being more than anything else.
music has always been my number one passion.
he taught me right from wrong.
My hands were always greasy from working on cars.
My biggest challenge was accepting that my whining was getting in the way of my relationships.

participant_2.background:
I am a hobbyist who flies model airplanes in my spare time.
I ride my bicycle every day to keep fit and to clear my head so I can focus on my writing.
My husband and I love working with our hands and building things together.
i like to build furniture.
i am passionate about a lot of things.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm currently on my lunch break, flying my model airplane.
Oh that sounds fun! I'm not much of a hobbyist myself, but I do enjoy music. What kind of music are you into?
I like all sorts of music, but I'm really into classic rock and blues. I love the sound of a good guitar solo.
Me too! What are some of your favorite bands?
I love Led Zeppelin, The Beatles, and The Rolling Stones. I also like some newer bands like The Black Keys and The White Stripes.
Those are all great bands! I love Led Zeppelin too. What's your favorite song by them?
I think my favorite song is either "Stairway to Heaven" or "Whole Lotta Love." What about you?
I love "Stairway to Heaven" too! It's such a beautiful song. I think my favorite song by them is "Kashmir."
"Kashmir" is a great song! I love the guitar solo in that one.
Me too! It's so iconic. So, what else do you like to do in your free time?
I like to ride my bicycle, and I love working with my hands. I build furniture with my husband and we love to go hiking and camping.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not much of a hiker, but I do love to camp.
We're always looking for new people to camp with! If you're ever in the area, let us know.
Thanks for the offer! I'll keep that in mind.
No problem! It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a great day!
